xwikidoc.name: Panel
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Panel

contentDescription.name: contentDescription
contentDescription.prettyName: Content description (Not applicable for "No content" type)

property.code:
{{velocity}} #set ($colorThemeDoc = $xwiki.getDocument($xwiki.getXWikiPreference('colorTheme'))) #set ($title = $xcontext.macro.params.title) #set ($titleColor = $xcontext.macro.params.titleColor) #if (!$titleColor) #set ($titleColor = $colorThemeDoc.getValue('panel-default-text')) #end #set ($titleBgColor = $xcontext.macro.params.titleBGColor) #if (!$titleBgColor) #set ($titleBgColor = $colorThemeDoc.getValue('panel-bg')) #end #set ($bgColor = $xcontext.macro.params.bgColor) #if (!$bgColor) #set ($bgColor = $colorThemeDoc.getValue('panel-bg')) #end #set ($borderStyle = $xcontext.macro.params.borderStyle) #if (!$borderStyle) #set ($borderStyle = 'solid') #end #set ($borderColor = $xcontext.macro.params.borderColor) #if (!$borderColor) #set ($borderColor = $colorThemeDoc.getValue('panel-bg')) #end #set ($borderWidth = "$!{xcontext.macro.params.borderWidth}px") #if (!$borderWidth) #set ($borderWidth = 0) #end #set ($content = $xcontext.macro.content) #set ($cssParams = { 'panelTitleColor': $titleColor, 'panelTitleBgColor': $titleBgColor, 'panelBgColor': $bgColor, 'panelBorderStyle': $borderStyle, 'panelBorderColor': $borderColor, 'panelBorderWidth': $borderWidth }) ## Make sure to clear the cache before loading a new css file so the new css values are computed everytime. The reason is that ## the SSX object uses velocity variables to generate the LESS code and those variables are cached. #set ($discard = $services.lesscss.clearCache()) #set ($discard = $xwiki.ssx.use('XWiki.Macros.Panel', $cssParams)) {{html clean="false"}}

$title

{{/html}} $xcontext.macro.content {{html clean="false"}}
{{/html}} {{/velocity}}

property.description: Add the Panel macro to a page to format your text in a customizable coloured panel.
The title of the panel. If specified, this title will be displayed in its own title row.
The color of the text in the title row of the panel. Colors can be specified as HTML color names or hexadecimal codes.
The background color of the title row of the panel. Colors can be specified as HTML color names or hexadecimal codes.
The background color of the panel. Colors can be specified as HTML color names or hexadecimal codes.
The style of the panel's border. Accepted values are solid, dashed and other valid CSS border styles.
The color of the panel's border. Colors can be specified as HTML color names or hexadecimal codes.
The width of the panel's border (in pixels).
